description: This file defines the MainActivity class for an Android app using Flutter. It extends FlutterActivity and serves as the entry point for the app's Android platform integration.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity class that integrates Flutter with Android. It inherits from FlutterActivity and acts as the activity that launches the Flutter app.

methods.name: MainActivity
methods.description: Constructor for MainActivity class, inherited from FlutterActivity.
